Server - package Server
This package contains the classes that are used in the server side of the application.
Server.Card - package Server.Card
This package contains the classes that represent the cards in the game.
Server.Chat - package Server.Chat
Contains the classes that are responsible for the chat functionality.
Server.Connections - package Server.Connections
This package contains the classes that are responsible for the connections with the clients.
Server.Controller - package Server.Controller
This package contains the classes that are responsible for the server logic
Server.Deck - package Server.Deck
This package contains the classes that are used to manage the decks in the server.
Server.Enums - package Server.Enums
Contains all the enums used in the game
Server.Exception - package Server.Exception
This package contains the exception classes that are thrown by the server.
Server.GameModel - package Server.GameModel
This package contains the classes that represent the game model.
Server.Manuscript - package Server.Manuscript
This package contains the classes that are responsible for the handling of the manuscript.
Server.Messages - package Server.Messages
This package contains the classes that are responsible for the handling of the messages.
Server.Player - package Server.Player
This package contains the classes that are responsible for the player data in the server
